faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before starting

items.q: What happens after I request a quote?
items.a: We'll schedule a brief discovery call (15-20 min) to understand your goals, needs, and confirm if we're the right fit for your project. Then, we prepare a detailed strategic proposal.

items.q: Do you work with purchased templates?
items.a: No. Every project starts from a blank canvas and is designed specifically for your business conversion goals, ensuring a fast, unique, and optimized digital presence.

items.q: Who owns the source code and domain when finished?
items.a: You are 100% the owner. Everything is registered under your company's name (domain, hosting, code), and we hand over all administrative access upon completion.
We work with a standard 50% upfront to reserve your spot in our development pipeline and start the strategy phase, and 50% upon launch. We accept wire transfers and credit cards.

items.q: Do you offer technical support after launch?
items.a: Yes, our Premium projects include one month of free priority post-launch support. For ongoing maintenance, we offer monthly retainers adapted to your operation level.
